channel.description: This is a chronicle of the lives of my former classmates and the amazing things they do after Stanford. Your daily dose of existential crisis. You're welcome.

item.title: About
item.description:
This is a chronicle of the lives of my former classmates and the amazing things they do after Stanford. Your daily dose of existential crisis. You’re welcome.

When reading about someone I admire, I often wonder what they did to get where they are – so that I can learn from them. I have no doubt that some of my classmates will become successful one day, and I hope that this blog will provide a window into their drive and their struggle.

You can sign up for the monthly newsletter to get the most interesting updates about what people are up to after Stanford here or in the box below.

If you’d like me to feature you or someone you know, shoot me an email, which you can find on my website huyenchip.com.

If you can’t get enough of my writing, find me on Twitter @chipro.
